body: Nagaji are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Nagaji have the following racial traits.
name: Nagaji

sections.body: Nagaji have strong bodies and personalities, but disdain intellectualism.
sections.name: +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, –2 Intelligence

sections.body: Nagaji are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
sections.name: Medium

sections.body: Nagaji have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Nagaji can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Nagaji have a +1 natural armor bonus due to their scaly flesh.
sections.name: Armored Scales

sections.body: Nagaji receive a +2 racial saving throw bonus against mind-affecting effects and poison.
sections.name: Resistant

sections.body: Nagaji receive a +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal checks against reptiles, and a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.
sections.name: Serpent's Sense

sections.body: : Nagaji begin play speaking Common and Draconic. Nagaji with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: any human language, Abyssal, Aklo, Celestial, Draconic, Giant, Infernal, and Sylvan.
sections.name: Languages
